name: Makhani Chicken (Indian Butter Chicken)
author: RKOZEL
summary: This fragrant, spicy Indian butter chicken recipe is from the owner of the India Cuisine restaurant in Seattle, Washington. Serve with hot Indian bread.
ingredients: 1 ¾ pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cubed
directions: To Marinate: Place chicken in a nonporous glass dish or bowl with lemon juice, 1 tablespoon chili powder and salt
Toss to coat; cover dish and refrigerate to marinate for 1 hour
Drain yogurt in a cloth for 15 to 20 minutes
Place in a medium bowl; mix in salt, garlic paste, garam masala, butter, chili powder, ginger paste, lemon juice and oil
Pour yogurt mixture over chicken, replace cover and refrigerate to marinate for another 3 to 4 hours
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Place skewers in a 9x13 inch baking dish and bake in preheated oven for 20 minutes, or until almost cooked through
To Make Sauce: Melt butter in a medium saucepan over medium heat
When masala begins to crackle, mix in ginger paste, chopped garlic and green chile peppers
Saute until tender, then stir in tomato puree, chili powder, salt and water
Bring to a boil; reduce heat to low and simmer, stirring in honey and fenugreek
Continue cooking for another 5 minutes, or until chicken is no longer pink inside
